content: Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will be effective for all of your portals.

comment.text: Use this option to customize your portal's on-brand mobile settings experience. This text is used as a subtitle in a category section, providing context for users navigating to LDAP settings on their mobile devices.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately translated. 'Brendə xas təcrübə' is a literal translation but doesn't fully convey the meaning. A more appropriate translation would emphasize consistency or a unified brand image.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'brendinizin vahid imicini saxlamaq üçün' (to maintain your brand's unified image) or 'brendinizlə müvafiq təcrübə' (brand-consistent experience).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'settings' is translated as 'parametrler'. While not entirely wrong, 'parametrler' is more technical. 'Parametrlər' can imply configuration items rather than general settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'parametr' which is broader, or 'quruluşlar' (configurations).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately conveyed by 'χαρακτηριστική εμπειρία'. While 'χαρακτηριστική' can mean distinctive, it doesn't capture the 'brand' aspect. A more accurate translation might involve terms related to brand identity or consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'on-brand experience' as 'εμπειρία σύμφωνη με την εταιρική σας ταυτότητα' or 'εμπειρία που αντικατοπτρίζει την εταιρική σας εικόνα'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຕາມທິດທາງຂອງຍີ່ຫໍ້" (tam thit thang khong yi ho) literally translates to 'according to the direction of your brand'. A more natural and accurate translation for 'on-brand' would be something like 'ສອດຄ່ອງກັບຍີ່ຫໍ້' (sot khong kap yi ho) or 'ເອກະລັກຂອງຍີ່ຫໍ້' (ekalak khong yi ho).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອໃຫ້ບໍລິການສອດຄ່ອງກັບຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງເຈົ້າ ໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຂອງເຈົ້າ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ບັນດາເວທີ" (bana wethii) translates to 'all platforms' but 'portals' is slightly different. 'ເວທີ' is a fine general term, but a more precise translation, depending on the context, could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການຕັ້ງຄ່າເຫຼົ່ານີ້ຈະມີຜົນສັກສິດຕໍ່ເວທີຂອງເຈົ້າທັງໝົດ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "zīmola lietošanas pieredzi" is a bit literal and could be improved for fluency. A more natural translation for 'on-brand experience' might be 'atbilstošu zīmola pieredzi' or 'atbilstošu zīmola veidu pieredzi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmantojiet šo opciju, lai jūsu lietotājiem nodrošinātu atbilstošu zīmola pieredzi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'portalen' is a Dutch variant of 'portals' and is incorrect. The correct spelling is 'portalen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: portalen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately translated. 'Pokazywać użytkownikom branding marki' is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning of providing a consistent brand look and feel. It sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Użyj tej opcji, aby zapewnić użytkownikom spójny wizerunek marki.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Twoich portalach' is slightly informal. While acceptable, it could be more formal for a technical setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Użyj tej opcji, aby zapewnić użytkownikom spójny wizerunek marki. Ustawienia te zostaną zastosowane na wszystkich portalach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "creştere a implicării" (growth of engagement) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "on-brand experience". "On-brand" refers to consistency with a company's brand identity, not necessarily engagement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizaţi această opţiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor dvs. o experienţă în concordanţă cu identitatea mărcii dvs. (or: o experienţă conformă cu identitatea mărcii dvs.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Missing period after 'utilizatorilor dvs' in the first sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizaţi această opţiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor dvs. o experienţă în concordanţă cu identitatea mărcii dvs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "on-brand experience" is not accurately translated. "Продемонстрировать пользователям ваш бренд" translates more to 'show your brand to users' which doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'on-brand experience'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Рассмотрите вариант перевода как "Обеспечьте пользователям фирменный опыт" or "Предоставьте пользователям опыт, соответствующий вашему бренду".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආභරණීය' (aabharanaya) translates to 'ornate' or 'jeweled', which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'on-brand'. A better translation would focus on aligning with the brand's identity and consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ බ්‍රන්දයට ගැළපෙන අත්දැකීමක් ලබා දීමට මෙම විකල්පය භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ද්වාර' (dwaara) which means 'doors' is used to translate 'portals'.  Portals often relate to online access points or web pages. This is not an accurate depiction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ සියලුම වෙබ් අඩවි සඳහා මෙම සැකසුම් වලංගු වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'on-brand experience' is translated as 'on-brandového zážitku'. While understandable, a more natural Slovak equivalent would be 'značkový zážitok' or 'zázitok v súlade s vašou značkou'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: značkový zážitok

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' is not correctly rendered in Cyrillic. It should be 'ће'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'in skladu sa brendom' (in accordance with the brand) is a literal translation that might not resonate naturally with Serbian users. A more natural phrasing would convey the idea of maintaining brand consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovu opciju da svojim korisnicima pružite usklađen doživaj (or 'doživej') brenda. (Use this option to provide a consistent brand experience to your users.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a semicolon after 'portale' which is unusual in this context. Removing it improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovu opciju da svojim korisnicima pružite usklađen doživaj brenda. Ova podešavanja će biti primenjena na sve vaše portale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'demonstrate your brand' ('продемонструвати користувачам ваш бренд') is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'on-brand experience'. A better translation would emphasize aligning with a brand's identity or appearance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Використовуйте цей варіант, щоб забезпечити відповідність вашого бренду для користувачів. (Use this option to ensure your brand aligns with your users.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "với thương hiệu" (with brand) isn't the most natural way to express 'on-brand'. A better phrasing would convey the concept of adhering to or reflecting the brand.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng tùy chọn này để cung cấp trải nghiệm phù hợp với thương hiệu cho người dùng của bạn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation reads a bit clunky. The sentence structure could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng tùy chọn này để mang đến trải nghiệm nhất quán với thương hiệu cho người dùng của bạn. Các cài đặt này sẽ có hiệu lực cho tất cả các cổng thông tin của bạn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "为您的用户提供品牌体验" (provide brand experience to your users) is a literal translation and doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'on-brand experience'. It's less impactful and natural in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation like “为您的用户呈现统一品牌形象” (present a unified brand image to your users) or “打造符合品牌形象的用户体验” (create a user experience that aligns with the brand image).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "这些设置将对您的所有门户有效" (These settings will be effective for all of your portals) is a little stiff. It could be phrased more naturally in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like “这些设置将应用于您的所有门户” (These settings will apply to all of your portals) or “这些设置适用于您的所有门户” (These settings are applicable to all of your portals).
